Copy constructor.
Move constructor - makes it possible to easily add Species to STL containers, such as vector<Species>...
Assignment operator An assignment A = B copies the name of B to A.
Move assignment is needed for the same reasons as move constructor.

unique id identifying the molecule (e.g. the integer id corresponding to "Arp2/3")
pointer to RSpecies; Species is responsible for creating and destroying RSpecies
